review: So easy to install a monkey could do it. Really user friendly. Fast download speed. Fun games. I downloaded HBO and Showtime apps and they work really well. The remote it comes with is small would be easy to loose, so I'd recommend downloading the remote app. The voice control on the app is great. Love this product.
